# backRightButton(position:)

**Type Method**

Returns the name of the back right button at the specified location.

## Declaration

```swift
static func backRightButton(position: Int) -> GCButtonElementName
```

## Parameters

- **position**: The relative position of the button to the other back right button. Pass `0` for the button nearest to the natural rest position of the personâ€™s finger. Pass `1` for an additional button that requires the person to move their fingers to press if it exists.

## Return Value

The name of the back right button.

## Getting extended gamepad back button names

- **backLeftButton(position:)**: Returns the name of the back left button at the specified location.
